songs.title: Desperate Graves
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
The swarms that I speak
Are the wrists I have cut
By flooding the tubs
Where the warmth held her up

The lockets believe
That the secret of love
Has caught its own tail
And it just won't give up

[Pre-Chorus]
When I breathe, the heavens can't hold me
And I can't believe anymore
The light brings
The highest execution
Show me the wings I must cut

[Chorus]
In your landfill days
These are desperate graves
Give me the altar
Red will shine
This pendulum won’t wait
In your landfill days
These are desperate graves
Give me the altar
Red will shine
This pendulum won’t wait

[Verse 2]
If I slay your spirit
With twin current volts
That weaken your knees
In the pit of my palms

Dressed in the slurs of
Bovine engines
To feast upon the carcass
Of your mother

[Pre-Chorus]
When I breathe, the heavens can't hold me
And I can't believe anymore
The light brings
The highest execution
Show me the wings I must cut

[Chorus]
In your landfill days
These are desperate graves
Give me the altar
Red will shine
This pendulum won’t wait
In your landfill days
These are desperate graves
Give me the altar
Red will shine
This pendulum won’t wait

[Bridge]
When I turn the dial
And leave the gas on
I'm the matchstick
That you'll never lose
These are the splinters
Made from a single blade
I'm the matchstick
That you'll never lose
I light the key that locks you in
I'm the matchstick
That you'll never lose
And you'll wear the burden
Of all my burns
I'm the matchstick
That you'll never lose

[Chorus]
In your landfill days
These are desperate graves
Give me the altar
Red will shine
This pendulum won’t wait
In your landfill days
These are desperate graves
Give me the altar
Red will shine
This pendulum won’t wait
In your landfill days
These are desperate graves
Give me the altar
Red will shine
This pendulum won’t wait
In your landfill days
These are desperate graves
Give me the altar
Red will shine
This pendulum won’t wait
